title: Does Anyone Know If Rengar Was On Sale This Month Yet?
body: I know{{champion:107}} was supposed to be on sale but idk if he was yet... can someone tell me so i know to save

replies.body: New sales are visible through the store, but we also post them on the site too!  We have a [Sales ](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/store/sales)page available that shows current and previous sales.  Hope that helps!
Rengar has not been on sale yet this month.
